version_description: Welcome to LEGO® DUPLO® WORLD—an entertaining digital play experience that supports young children’s growth and development.

Welcome to LEGO® DUPLO® WORLD—an entertaining digital play experience that supports young children’s growth and development.
Now updated with bug fixes and improvements!

Discover a winter wonderland with three brand new activities. Santa has arrived with elves, gifts, and even a flying reindeer! Build a snowman and have a fun snowball fight. Time for some ice-skating on a frozen pond around a festive tree. With lots more seasonal surprises to discover!
Now updated with bug fixes and improvements!

A selection of new adorable animal bricks for children to add to their virtual 3D LEGO® DUPLO® building creations.
Some minor content updates to improve user experience.

SPLASH! It's time to go underwater in our new UNDER THE SEA activity. Explore caves in a submarine and find treasure. Use virtual 3D LEGO® DUPLO® bricks to build weird and wonderful sea creatures. Take photographs of cute and playful creatures you meet. Help Bossy Fish decorate her coral garden with pretty patterns.
We've added festive Spring-time fun, with an egg hunt game and some bouncy Easter bunnies!
Now updated with bug fixes and improvements!

Try our FREE fun new Creative Building feature! Develop problem solving skills by completing cute puzzles made of LEGO® DUPLO® bricks. Or, if you prefer, use the bricks to build anything else you fancy...
Now updated with bug fixes and improvements!

Welcome to Play House, our new pretend play activity in the wonderful DUPLO® house, featuring a happy family and their cute dog. Cook food in the kitchen and then get the family to enjoy a delicious meal together. How about a fun play date with a friend - do you enjoy disco dancing? In the bathroom, you will learn about hand-washing, as well as having soapy fun in the bath. At the end of a fun-filled day, there is an adorable and sleepy bedtime routine.

Welcome to Play House, our new pretend play activity in the wonderful DUPLO® house, featuring a happy family and their cute dog. Cook food in the kitchen and then get the family to enjoy a delicious meal together. How about a fun play date with a friend - do you enjoy disco dancing? In the bathroom, you will learn about hand-washing, as well as having soapy fun in the bath. At the end of a fun-filled day, there is an adorable and sleepy bedtime routine.
We have fixed an issue that some of you reported relating to accessing the activities. Thank you for getting in touch and letting us know.
Happy Halloween! Find the hidden pumpkins in our fun treasure hunt game. We have also made some improvements to the Construction Site activity.

Enjoy a new FREE Creative Building puzzle that lets little ones develop their problem solving and fine motor skills. We’ve also been hard at work making technical improvements to your app. We hope you enjoy an even better performance.
Are you hungry? Enjoy some fantastic play and learning opportunities with our new Food Fun! activity.

Time for some festive fun! Help Santa and his elves to give gifts to children. Build a snowman, or how about a snowball fight? Explore cause and effect with figures skating and sliding on a frozen pond. With lots more seasonal surprises to discover!

We have also made some improvements to the Food Fun! activity.

Enjoy a new FREE Creative Building puzzle that lets little ones develop their problem solving and fine motor skills. We’ve also been hard at work making technical improvements to your app. We hope you enjoy an even better performance.

Love is in the air! To celebrate Valentine's Day we've added a rainbow love heart Creative Building puzzle to help little ones develop their problem solving and fine motor skills. We’ve also been hard at work making technical improvements to your app. We hope you enjoy an even better performance.

We have a brand new AIRPLANE ADVENTURES pack for you and your child to enjoy.
We have also fixed and issue that some of you were experiencing on app start.

Enjoy an adorable new FREE Spring-themed Creative Building puzzle that lets little ones develop their problem solving and fine motor skills. We have also made improvements to the Airplane Adventures activity to make it even more fun and enjoyable.

A special release to mark Earth Day and celebrate our world's wonderful wildlife! We have added a gorgeous new toucan Creative Building puzzle that helps kids to develop their problem-solving and fine-motor skills.

We have added an exciting new Farm pack with lots of play opportunities that are great fun AND offer many learning benefits.

We have also introduced new IAP bundles to give you MORE value discount options.

We have updated our FREE Number Train play pack with a fresh new look. And we've added a new FREE cupcake puzzle that lets kids practice problem-solving and fine motor skills. We have also made improvements to the Farm play pack. This includes enhanced play opportunities with the tractor and farm animals.
